p: A mixture of 6-amino-2-chloroquinoline-3-carbaldehyde (0.01 mol, 1.91 g) and4-methyl acetophenone in 40% ethanolic NaOH was stirred vigorously for 2 h and kept overnight at room temperature. The reaction mixture was poured onto crushed ice and acidified with 1:1 HCl. The solid 3-(6-amino-2-chloroquinoline-3-yl)-1- p -tolylprop-2-en-1-one (3c) was isolated. It was recrystallized using acetic acid and ethanol. m.p. 240 °C.Yield: 84%. Color: yellowish-white.
